about_the_game:
This is a Steam version of a hit visual novel game released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. It is a collection of romantic, richly illustrated interactive stories with the following premise:

The protagonist? A hard-working rising star at a major advertising agency!

She's lived a driven, no-nonsense life thus far... until she wakes up from a party in an unfamiliar bed!

Who's next to her? And was it a fling or something more...?

This is a sensual, modern take on love that begins with a one-night stand. With a cast of attractive love interests and a sizzling start, this title is a long-time favorite among fans.

An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

In addition, some graphics and scenarios have been changed from the app version.

The Story:

One morning, I wake up in an unfamiliar bed.

Underwear on the floor… Rumpled sheets…

Did I spend the night with someone?!

I decide to forget it ever happened, but then I get a text saying, “I want to see you again tonight”…

Can true love start with a one-night stand?

Characters:

Shunichiro Tachibana "Brilliant star of the agency"

Toshiaki Kijima "A tough exec who takes his coffee black"

Toma Kiriya "A gifted and aloof copywriter"

Taku Hayama "A chance encounter"

Go Okubo "A sweetheart on artist"

Contents:

Includes "Main Stories" in the app "Love 365: Find Your Story," up until "S3 Binding Hearts"

content_descriptors.notes: Some stories may contain scenes of a sexual nature not suitable for all ages.
